mapper.select: SELECT cvegeo AS "Clave", nombre AS "Nombre" FROM ce2014.ent WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913), #{buffer}) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913),#{buffer})) limit 1

SELECT cvegeo AS "Clave", nombre AS "Nombre", cvegeo AS "cvegeo" FROM ce2014.zm WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913), #{buffer}) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913),#{buffer})) limit 1

SELECT cve_mun AS "Clave", nombre AS "Municipio", cve_ent AS "Clave_ent", nom_ent AS "Entidad", clavegeo as "cvegeo" FROM ce2014.mun WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913),#{buffer}) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913),#{buffer})) limit 1

SELECT cvegeo AS "Clave", nomloc AS "Localidad", cve_mun AS "Cve_mun", nom_mun AS "Municipio", cve_ent AS "Cve_ent", nom_ent AS "Entidad", clavegeo AS "cvegeo" FROM ce2014.loc_urb WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913),#{buffer})AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913),#{buffer})) limit 1

SELECT cvegeo AS "Clave", cvegeo AS "Ageb", cve_loc AS "Cve_loc", nom_loc AS "Localidad", cve_mun AS "Cve_mun", nom_mun AS "Municipio", cve_ent AS "Cve_ent", nom_ent AS "Entidad", clavegeo as "cvegeo" FROM ce2014.ageb WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913), #{buffer}) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913), #{buffer})) limit 1

SELECT ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "v04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01, r02, r03, r04, r05, r06, r07, r08, r09, r10, r11
FROM ce2014.entidad_gransector_${year} e,
FROM ce2014.entidad_sector_${year} e,
FROM ce2014.entidad_subsector_${year} e,
ce2014.cat_ce c WHERE e.sector=c.id AND cvegeo=#{cvegeo} AND sector=#{granSector}

SELECT ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "v04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01, r02, r03, r04, r05, r06, r07, r08, r09, r10, r11
FROM ce2014.zm_gransector_${year} e,
FROM ce2014.zm_sector_${year} e,
FROM ce2014.zm_subsector_${year} e,
ce2014.cat_ce c WHERE e.sector=c.id AND cve_zm='9000' AND cvegeo=#{cvegeo} AND sector=#{granSector}

SELECT ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "v04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01, r02, r03, r04, r05, r06, r07, r08, r09, r10, r11
FROM ce2014.municipal_gransector_${year} m,
FROM ce2014.municipal_sector_${year} m,
FROM ce2014.municipal_subsector_${year} m,
ce2014.cat_ce c WHERE m.sector= c.id AND cvegeo=#{cvegeo} AND sector=#{granSector}

SELECT ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "v04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01, r02, r03, r04, r05, r06, r07, r08, r09, r10, r11
FROM ce2014.loc_gransector_${year} m,
FROM ce2014.loc_sector_${year} m,
FROM ce2014.loc_subsector_${year} m,
ce2014.cat_ce c WHERE m.sector= c.id AND cvegeo=#{cvegeo} AND sector=#{granSector}

SELECT ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "v04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01, r02, r03, r04, r05, r06, r07, r08, r09, r10, r11
FROM ce2014.ageb_gransector_${year} m,
FROM ce2014.ageb_sector_${year} m,
FROM ce2014.ageb_subsector_${year} m,
ce2014.cat_ce c WHERE m.sector= c.id AND cvegeo=#{cvegeo} AND sector=#{granSector}

SELECT nombre AS "Nombre del Estado",
participa AS "Participaci贸n", ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "V04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01 AS "R01", r02 AS "R02", r03 AS "R03", r04 AS "R04", r05 AS "R05", r06 AS "R06", r07 AS "R07", r08 AS "R08", r09 AS "R09", r10 AS "R10", r11 AS "R11"
participa2 AS "Participaci贸n", ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "V04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01 AS "R01", r02 AS "R02", r03 AS "R03", r04 AS "R04", r05 AS "R05", r06 AS "R06", r07 AS "R07", r08 AS "R08", r09 AS "R09", r10 AS "R10", r11 AS "R11"
FROM ce2014.entidad_gransector_${year} e
FROM ce2014.entidad_sector_${year} e
FROM ce2014.entidad_subsector_${year} e
WHERE sector=#{id}
cvegeo=#{item}
ORDER BY participa
ORDER BY participa2
limit 10

SELECT nombre AS "Nombre del Estado",
participa AS "Participaci贸n", ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "V04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01 AS "R01", r02 AS "R02", r03 AS "R03", r04 AS "R04", r05 AS "R05", r06 AS "R06", r07 AS "R07", r08 AS "R08", r09 AS "R09", r10 AS "R10", r11 AS "R11"
participa2 AS "Participaci贸n", ue AS "V01", h001a AS "V02", h020a AS "V03", h010a AS "V04", i100a AS "V05", k000a AS "V06", m000a AS "V07", q000a AS "V08", a111a AS "V09", a131a AS "V10", k412a AS "V11", k976a AS "V12", r01 AS "R01", r02 AS "R02", r03 AS "R03", r04 AS "R04", r05 AS "R05", r06 AS "R06", r07 AS "R07", r08 AS "R08", r09 AS "R09", r10 AS "R10", r11 AS "R11"
FROM ce2014.zm_gransector_${year} e
FROM ce2014.zm_sector_${year} e
FROM ce2014.zm_subsector_${year} e
WHERE sector=#{id}
cve_zm='9000'
AND cvegeo=#{cvegeo}
ORDER BY participa
ORDER BY participa2
limit 10

SELECT cve_mun AS cvegeo ,nombre as name FROM ce2014.mun
SELECT cvegeo,nombre as name from ce2014.ent
WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point},900913),5) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{point}, 900913),5))
AND cve_ent=#{ent}
limit 1

SELECT cvegeo ,nombre as name FROM
ce2014.zm ce2014.loc_urb
WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point},900913),5) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point}, 900913),5)) AND cve_zm in
#{cvegeo}
limit 1

SELECT cvegeo,nombre as name from ce2014.ent WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point},900913),5) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point}, 900913),5)) limit 1

SELECT cvegeo ,nomloc as name FROM ce2014.loc_urb WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point},900913),5) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point}, 900913),5))
AND cve_ent AND clavemun
in
#{cvegeo}
limit 1

SELECT cvegeo ,cvegeo as name FROM ce2014.ageb WHERE the_geom && ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point},900913),5) AND ST_Intersects(the_geom, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText(#{info.point}, 900913),5))
AND clavemun AND claveloc
in
#{cvegeo}
limit 1
